name: twinkling trees stocking
sizes_available: designed for a classic full-size christmas stocking in worsted weight yarn, approx 6.5” by 19.5”.
notes:
bring a warm winter glow to your festive décor with the twinkling trees stocking, a beautifully elegant overlay mosaic crochet pattern worked in one seamless piece from toe to cuff. this cosy worsted-weight project is perfect if you’ve ever searched for a fun holiday crochet pattern with a traditional feel, or simply love seasonal makes that look far more complicated than they are.

this listing includes two different stocking options, detailed written instructions, how-to charts, plus a supporting video tutorial showing you how to crochet a traditional stocking using the overlay mosaic technique.

whether you’re new to mosaic crochet or already hooked, this pattern is a fun, festive way to learn, create, and celebrate the season in style.

a great crochet project for adventurous beginners and beyond that allows the mosaic crochet detail to shine through. crocheted using us sc and dc stitches.

*please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english, not a finished product.

pattern features:
2 designs included: two different twinkling trees mosaic charts to choose from
technique: overlay mosaic crochet
construction: worked in one piece, toe-up, seamless
skill level: intermediate (or adventurous beginner with the video tutorial!)
adult)skill level: adventurous beginner/intermediate
stitches: single crochet and double crochet
format: instant pdf download + full video tutorial
language: english (us terms) with uk stitch conversion chart

 finished size (approx.):
designed for a classic full-size christmas stocking in worsted weight yarn, approx 6.5” by 19.5”.

materials needed:
category 4 worsted weight yarn (i used 100% acrylic, 165m / 180yds / 100g) exact yarn detailed in pattern.
yarn a: each size needs 1 ball of yarn. approx 110yds.
yarn b: each size needs 1 ball of yarn. approx 150yds.
crochet hook 5mm (h) for the rib and 5.5mm (i) for the toe, main body and heel or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern. 
yarn needle
scissors
stitch markers

pattern includes:
detailed instructions over 14 page ebook
stitch guide
sizing chart/schematic
step by step stitch tutorial
colour inspiration page
full video tutorial
customisation guide

instant download: start crocheting your own crochet stocking pattern today! purchase includes immediate access to the 14-page pdf pattern in us crochet terms.

gauge: 
15 sts and 14 rounds = 4" by 4"

❤️ make it yours
this stocking is more than a decoration — it’s a keepsake you’ll bring out year after year. whether you’re looking for a holiday crochet project, planning handmade gifts, or wanting to learn how to crochet a christmas stocking, the twinkling trees design adds festive charm to any home.

need help?
we're here for you! contact us anytime in the hanjan crochet community group for pattern support or questions.
